name: Agra
description: Home to the Taj Mahal, a symbol of love. (India Destination #1)

name: Jaipur
description: Known as the Pink City, rich in forts and palaces. (India Destination #2)

name: Varanasi
description: Spiritual capital of India on the banks of the Ganges. (India Destination #3)

name: Goa
description: Popular for beaches, nightlife, and heritage. (India Destination #4)

name: Kerala
description: Famous for backwaters and Ayurveda. (India Destination #5)

name: Leh
description: Scenic beauty and Buddhist monasteries. (India Destination #6)

name: Manali
description: Hill station with snow sports and mountain views. (India Destination #7)

name: Mumbai
description: Financial hub and home to Bollywood. (India Destination #8)

name: Delhi
description: Capital city with historical landmarks. (India Destination #9)

name: Amritsar
description: Golden Temple, Sikh pilgrimage site. (India Destination #10)

name: Rishikesh
description: Yoga capital on the Ganges. (India Destination #11)

name: Udaipur
description: City of Lakes with royal heritage. (India Destination #12)

name: Kolkata
description: Cultural capital with colonial charm. (India Destination #13)

name: Chennai
description: South Indian hub for temples and beaches. (India Destination #14)

name: Hyderabad
description: Blend of old city and tech hub. (India Destination #15)

name: Bangalore
description: India's tech capital with green spaces. (India Destination #16)

name: Darjeeling
description: Tea gardens and Himalayan views. (India Destination #17)

name: Shillong
description: Hill station known as Scotland of the East. (India Destination #18)

name: Mysore
description: Known for palaces and Dussehra. (India Destination #19)

name: Pondicherry
description: French colonial town by the sea. (India Destination #20)

name: Coorg
description: Coffee plantations and scenic hills. (India Destination #21)

name: Jodhpur
description: Blue city with historic forts. (India Destination #23)

name: Ajanta
description: Cave temples and Buddhist art. (India Destination #25)

name: Srinagar
description: Dal Lake and Himalayan beauty. (India Destination #27)

name: Kodaikanal
description: Lake town in Tamil Nadu hills. (India Destination #28)

name: Tirupati
description: Temple city in Andhra Pradesh. (India Destination #30)

name: Rann of Kutch
description: Salt desert with cultural fest. (India Destination #33)

name: Konark
description: Sun Temple and coastal beauty. (India Destination #35)

name: Madurai
description: Meenakshi Temple and Tamil culture. (India Destination #36)

name: Rameswaram
description: Religious town on Pamban Island. (India Destination #37)

name: Aurangabad
description: Gateway to Ajanta and Ellora. (India Destination #38)

name: Bikaner
description: Desert city with Junagarh Fort. (India Destination #39)

name: Jaisalmer
description: Golden City in the Thar Desert. (India Destination #40)

name: Gwalior
description: Historic city with grand forts. (India Destination #41)

name: Haridwar
description: Spiritual city on the Ganges. (India Destination #42)

name: Tawang
description: Scenic town in Arunachal Pradesh. (India Destination #43)

name: Kaziranga
description: Home of the one-horned rhino. (India Destination #44)

name: Patna
description: Historic city on the Ganges. (India Destination #46)

name: Guntur
description: City in Andhra known for chili. (India Destination #47)
